title: Google\Cloud\ApigeeRegistry\V1\Instance\Config
name: Config
description:
Available configurations to provision an Instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.apigeeregistry.v1.Instance.Config

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.location
params.description: Output only. The GCP location where the Instance resides.

params.name: data.cmek_key_name
params.description: Required. The Customer Managed Encryption Key (CMEK) used for data encryption. The CMEK name should follow the format of projects/([^/]+)/locations/([^/]+)/keyRings/([^/]+)/cryptoKeys/([^/]+), where the location must match InstanceConfig.location.

methods.description:
